item.title: [PI]Spawn server[PI]
item.dc:creator: @pastaway pastaway
item.description:
@pastaway wrote:

in itemassistant you can make it to wear only donators can wear that certain item so if a normal player spawns it they wouldnt be able to wear it so it would be useless to them anyways… under wear item you would find something like this

*Wear Item **/ public boolean wearItem(int wearID, int slot) { synchronized(c) { int targetSlot=0; boolean canWearItem = true; if(c.isDonator == 0) { if(wearID==18349 || wearID==18351 || wearID==18353 || wearID==18355 || wearID==18357) { c.sendMessage("You need to be a Donator to wear this item!"); return false; } }

those are the id codes i have for my chaotics but you can just change those to any item you want and and add more items by just adding || wearID==# after the next item.
hope it helps

Read full topic

item.title: [PI]Spawn server[PI]
item.dc:creator: @owns_reece owns reece
item.description:
@owns_reece wrote:

Ok i have a spawn server i’m just getting into 317’s. here is my ::item command:

if (playerCommand.startsWith("item")) { try { String[] args = playerCommand.split(" "); if (args.length == 3) { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]); if ((newItemID <= 20500) && (newItemID >= 0)) { c.getItems().addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { c.sendMessage("That item ID does not exist."); } } else { c.sendMessage("Wrong usage: (Ex:(::pickup_ID_Amount)(::item 995 1))");
i want it so only donors can spawn pk gear and chaotics any help?

Read full topic
